Posts.Content: b1926 wrote: I am 58  and was recently Dx with invasive intraductal carcinoma Grade I. Since my cancer is multicentric I will have a mastectony. I have read different opinions about nipple sparing.  Has someone had this done for large sagging breast.  Thanks.  I am going to have implants instead of autologous tissue. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mastectomy with nipple sparing b1926 cjc1961
